ygData.subject: Re: Lifetaps and Races
ygData.msgSnippet: Take away all magic items, and I believe you will find no real significant difference. The small difference that is there can easily be made up for with magic
ygData.messageBody:
Take away all magic items, and I believe you will find no real significant
difference. The small difference that is there can easily be made up for
with magic items. I think the difference in damage will be insignificant as
well. (i.e. 2 level 40 SK, one ogre, one De. Both naked except for a BIBS)
I think there will be little difference in both hitpoints and damage. If
there is a small difference, it can be made up for via items. DE with more
+str items, while the ogre more +agi items.
Have no real statistics though, anyone else?

Morgul

Big races do get the Slam deal, but not sure if that trades off with the
xtra KOS and dependancy on a shaman for shrink.
----- Original Message -----
From: Wilson, ThomasX B <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 12:27 PM
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Lifetaps and Races


> From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
> Since I've never played a troll or an Ogre how many more Hps do they have
> compared to a DE or Human? Anybody happen to know?
>
>
>
